resources.string: 1. Which European country lost around 30% of its population to famine in the early years of the 17th century?
2. What wasnt invented by Blaise Pascal in the 17th century as a by-product of his attempts to produce a perpetual motion machine?
3. Who in 1670 is credited with inventing champagne?
4. What did Christian Huygens invent in the 17th century to revolutionise clock making?
5. Which musical instrument wasnt said to have been invented in Nuremburg in 1690?
6. What did Englands puritan leaders ban in 1647?
